title: Marriage Expectations
text:
Abstract
Using Monitoring the Future (MTF) Public-Use Cross-Sectional Datasets (1976-2022), this visualization presents U.S. twelfth graders marriage expectations by gender, racial group, and mothers’ education. It shows…

Keywords
marriage, attitudes, adolescents, visualization

[motivation paragraph]
[data/methods] Additional details are available in the online supplement and data access and replication code are available at: https://github.com/jrpepin/MTF_Marriage.
